page.title: 01 Summary Of The Area.
page.content: A predominantly{rural area,}the rolling countryside sloping from North to South. { Farming Communities}are scattered throughout the region with larger centres of population at{ASTLEY {ABBOTS,TASLEY}and{NORDLEY. { Nordley}was mentioned in the original Domesday Book as{Nordlege. In the South East corner the sprawl of suburbia intrudes. {Farming}is the main source of employment.The farms are mixed:cereal crops and livestock. Many{Coppices}are to be found,the wood being originally used to produce {charcoal}and{pit-props}for the local {iron}and{coal}industries. The{Cantern Brook}crosses the area from NW to SE over an underlying geology of{red sandstone}and {carboniferous limestone.
